FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_hackathon.summary: Recent activities in the repository include updates to the content of the Home page, problem-statement, evaluation, and resources page. Additionally, new logos were added, and meta keywords were updated. These changes demonstrate ongoing efforts to improve and maintain the repository.

FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: The repository has seen significant activity with updates to the xsl files for geometry point values, ExplicitLink, and xmlparser file. Code cleanup and fixes, such as changing exit codes and updating Switch functionality, have also been implemented. These changes suggest a focus on enhancing the project's functionality and maintainability.

FOSSEE/fossee-banners.summary: Recent updates include the addition of a new banner for the scilab hackathon and an update to an existing banner link. These changes indicate efforts to keep the repository's content current and visually engaging.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: A recent update added Arduino Workshop Certificates, contributing to the repository's purpose of generating certificates for various workshops and events.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_portal.summary: The repository saw an update with the addition of descriptions under project titles, which was directly added from GitHub. This change aims to enhance the repository's content and provide more detailed information.
